name: Ornare Oculos
description:
Ornare Oculos Team:

We are in need of your firm's unique skillset once more. We've had...unusual activity at the old shotgun shack on the edge of town. We've sent in other units, but they turned back as soon as things started getting active in there. The ghost is leaving some sort of cards out. They seem to be trying to give clues about their death, but all our efforts have ended in losses.

We need you to go in and figure out why this ghost is so volatile. Use your visions to solve this case. Go room-by-room and use your visions to figure out what the ghost is trying to tell you. Be careful, when you go into a vision time gets wonky. Also, guessing the wrong thing will bring you closer to midnight. Trust me...you don't want to get to midnight. I know we've sold this job well, but as always, there's good money in it if you can stop the haunting.

Good luck detective - or whatever you consider your job description...

Credits

Designed and built by DustyRedBird and NotMrSam.

Tested by friends on the DustyRedBird discord server.

Built within 72 hours for the MiniJam 117 Game Jam!

Check out DustyRedBird's game dev YouTube Channel!

Assets Used

Anything not listed below was made by DustyRedBird and NotMrSam.

Art for Visions and Newspapers generated by Stable Diffusion AI.

Assorted Rocks, Trees, and Shrubs from Unity Asset Store:

  • Manufactura K4
  • shui861wy
  • PolyFix
  • Pixel Games

3D Textures from:

  • 3dtextures.me

Skybox from Unity Asset Store:

  • Avinox

A few SFXs mixed from files from:

  • freesound.org

Voice lines generated using xVASynth v2
